mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_code ,c.writer ,c.content ,c.created_date ,c.bulletin_no ,p.profile_picture FROM pet_stargram_comment c JOIN pet_stargram_bulletin b ON c.bulletin_no = b.bulletin_no JOIN pet_stargram_profile p ON b.member_code = p.member_code WHERE c.bulletin_no = #{bulletinNo} ORDER BY c.comment_code DESC
